description: Gains mana every time it attacks and is attacked. Each $2% mana increases attack speed by $3% and health by $1. At max mana, attacks deal $4% splash damage in a small radius for $5 attacks.
name: Aegis
tooltip: Gains mana every time it attacks and is attacked. Each 10% mana increases attack speed by 4% and health by 80. At max mana, attacks deal 25% splash damage in a small radius for 25 attacks.
